mapper.insert: INSERT INTO masseur (empno, ncnm, sexdstn, bld_code, hffc_yn, reg_empno, reg_dt, updt_empno, updt_dt, MSSR_NAME) VALUES (#{Empno}, #{mssrNCName},#{sexdstn}, #{bldCode}, 'Y', #{regEmpNo}, sysdate(), null, null,#{mssrName})
